body:
Sorry for not posting yesterday; the planned candidate didn't accept my skype request. Anyways, back again with another spotlight. If you want one of your own, fill out the application format here: https://goo.gl/forms/f9XjcBVJ5vMl72bZ2. Today's spotlightee is KojaCola!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
My ign is KojaCola and my favorite Avicus gamemode is frenzy.

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
My irl name is Kochan and I am half American half Japanese, hence where koJAPAN comes from. Im a sophmore in high school. 

​What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
I am excited because I just evolved a magikarp in Pokemon GO and I am obsessed right now with finishing a chemistry project due tommorow which I havent started xD

What interests you the most in life?
I love photography and is one of my main hobbied. I use an a6000 camera and use my camera whenever I can!

​What music/art/media do you like?
Im not much of a music person but I play classical piano and jazz drums.

​Where are you from?
I am from Manhatten in NYC.

​What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?​
I spend most of my time on Avicus talking with friends and playing scrimmages. 

​Anything else you want to mention?
I love the Avicus community but I have not been able to get on recently because of school which is a bit annoying but I hope to meet a lot of new people and keep the Avicus community growing!

title: Community Spotlight #11 - KojaCola
